description: Gintoki and crew continue to defend Sarutobi against the Lethal Punishers. But against such assassins as the Pillow Masa, T-shirt Tatsu, and the Chuubert Chu Brothers, will they win?

titles.title: Glasses Prevent You From Seeing Certain Things
Megane Ja Mienai Mono ga Aru
メガネじゃ見えないものがある
